import axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const URI = 'http://localhost:8000/operations/' const FilterBar = () => { const [operations, setOperation] = useState([]) // Procedimiento para mostrar todas las operaciones const getOperations = async () => { const res = await axios.get(URI) setOperation(res.data) } return(
